stateDiagram-v2
    %% L++ State Diagram: L++ Blueprint Registry
    [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] --> idle
    idle --> ready : INIT
    idle --> ready : LOAD
    ready --> ready : LOAD
    ready --> ready : REGISTER [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    ready --> ready : UPDATE [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    viewing --> viewing : UPDATE [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    ready --> viewing : GET [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    viewing --> viewing : GET
    ready --> searching : LIST [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    ready --> searching : SEARCH [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    searching --> searching : SEARCH
    searching --> viewing : SELECT [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    viewing --> viewing : VERSIONS [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    viewing --> comparing : COMPARE [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    comparing --> comparing : COMPARE
    viewing --> viewing : ROLLBACK [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    viewing --> viewing : DEPS [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    viewing --> viewing : CHECK_DEPS [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    viewing --> viewing : DEPRECATE [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    viewing --> ready : DELETE [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    ready --> ready : DELETE [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    ready --> ready : EXPORT [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    viewing --> viewing : EXPORT
    ready --> ready : STATS [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    viewing --> ready : BACK
    searching --> ready : BACK
    comparing --> viewing : BACK

extra.repo_description: L++ is not a programming language. It is a language-agnostic Logic Frame designed to execute business processes defined in purely symbolic, declarative blueprints.
